title: Serial Ep. 5: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's David Haglund, Julia Turner, and Katy Waldman discuss the fifth episode of the podcast Serial, from This American Life and producers Sarah Koenig and Julia Snyder. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've listened to the Serial episode.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
